Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Desirability \De*sir`a*bil"i*ty\, n. The state or quality of being desirable; desirableness. [1913 Webster]
desirability n 1: the quality of being worthy of desiring [syn: {desirableness}] [ant: {undesirability}] 2: attractiveness to the opposite sex [syn: {sex appeal}, {desirableness}, {oomph}]
